name: Yellow Lentil Soup: Vegan Comfort Food
description: Daal Series - Yellow Lentil Soup. Delicious, healthy and easy vegan comfort food packed full of spices and delicious flavors.
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup split yellow mung daal ((split and skinless green gram/green mung bean))
1/3 cup split Toor daal ((split and skinless pigeon pea))
1/2  Serrano chili pepper or any chili pepper chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the lentils in warm water for an hour to overnight.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the lentils in warm water for an hour to overnight.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pressure cooker or pan, heat the oil on medium heat until hot on medium low heat.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pressure cooker or pan, heat the oil on medium heat until hot on medium low heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add mustard(raee) seeds and after a few seconds of sputtering, add cumin(jeera) and nigella(Kalonji) seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add mustard(raee) seeds and after a few seconds of sputtering, add cumin(jeera) and nigella(Kalonji) seeds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the asofetida(hing) and curry leaves and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the asofetida(hing) and curry leaves and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chili and garlic and cook till garlic is golden brown.( 1-2 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chili and garlic and cook till garlic is golden brown.( 1-2 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Add in onions and cook until translucent.(3-4 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: Add in onions and cook until translucent.(3-4 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the soaked daal and add it to the pan with the water, salt, 1/4 teaspoon sugar(optional) and turmeric.
recipeInstructions.name: Rinse the soaked daal and add it to the pan with the water, salt, 1/4 teaspoon sugar(optional) and turmeric.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well. Cook for 2 whistles in pressure cooker or Cook covered for 20-25 minutes if in pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well. Cook for 2 whistles in pressure cooker or Cook covered for 20-25 minutes if in pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot garnished with cilantro and lime wedges !. Serve with basmati rice or as a side dish with Roti, pickles, one or two vegetable stir fry dishes and a salad of onions and cucumbers tossed in lemon juice, salt and black pepper!. Theres your complete indian meal!

recipeInstructions.text: You can also serve this as dip with some nice crusty bread. Add some lime juice, olive oil, chopped cucumber and garam masala on the dip!
